No, what I meant was, I don't go to a school building, I stay at home and h=
it the books.  And even when I am an adult, Role Playing Games will still b=
e fun.  So fuck you!  And also, if you think adults playing RPG's is funny,=
 then I assume you're making fun of Logo, she's 21.
